title: Dragons' Mate
description: They had been searching for their mate, but when they find her she is traumatized and scared to be around strange men. They must get her to accept them before they reveal their true natures. Will their love be strong enough to break down her barriers? Could she truly be destined to love two dragons?Today Annie’s dragons will shift and fulfill her every desire, which means a fiery threesome—and true love.
author: Beverly Ovalle
